entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or periods of snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 12:27 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain or periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:27 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 12:27 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
